column4: what init.d process(es) and kde processes need to be restarted when knetworkmanager takes it's usual s**t?  knm. has alzheimers and forgets to a) renew IP when a link comes up and b) totally forgets there are network interfaces installed
libata is the new and improved way of doing things unfortunately you can no longer use hdparm on it
no hdparm ? that is not a real advantage. is there any replacement to set DMA and transfer modes then ?
